abstract: The  New York attorney general-elect has established a transition committee that will help him “recruit top legal talent” for when he takes over in January.
snippet: The  New York attorney general-elect has established a transition committee that will help him “recruit top legal talent” for when he takes over in January.
lead_paragraph: The New York attorney general-elect, Eric T. Schneiderman, will have a big role in policing Wall Street, and on Tuesday he tapped several prominent Wall Street lawyers and senior aides of predecessors to help him find staff lawyers to do the job.

headline.main: New Attorney General Asks for Hiring Advice
